Energy Storage Solutions

Batterix

EV energy storage for longer range, faster charging, and wider operating temperature performance.

At a glance

Key product details for quick comparison.

Segment

EV

Key differentiators

Reported high energy density and fast charging performance.

Technology

Graphene-based supercapacitor battery platform (reported).

Safety

No thermal runaway reported in testing.

Benefits

  • Supports longer range in EV applications.
  • Reported fast charging performance.
  • Safety-focused design with reported thermal stability.
  • Wider operating temperature performance.

Use cases

Electric vehicle powertrains

High-performance EV charging applications

Fleet electrification projects

Technical specs

Tested energy density (reported) 460 Wh/kg
Charge time (reported) Approx. 6 minutes
Thermal runaway (reported) Not observed in reported tests

Specifications vary by model and configuration; refer to datasheets.

Downloads and resources

  • Graphene battery performance brief (PDF) Datasheet
  • Energy density testing context Overview
  • EV storage positioning (Burj Modaraba) Overview
